attributes.action: Honour your promise for a referendum to leave the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Two Governments now have signed treaty's detrimental to the people of the United Kingdom of Great Britain.
Therefore Mr Blair I challenge you to HONOUR the promise of a Referendum to stay or leave the EU. Let the Country decide their fate in an open honest & fair referendum.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
